title: Dr. Krystal Couture | Pure Balance Holistic Healing
description: Awaken healing from within with holistic physical therapy, acupuncture and micro needling so you can live your best life. Release the pain, discomfort and Mal-alignment in the physical, emotional, and intellectual bodies to live your soul purpose.
cleaned_text: Mission I'm here to help you tap into the unlimited healing potential within, so you can live your very best life. Healing brings you closest to your true nature, supporting you in living the life you desire most. Together, we'll release pain, discomfort and mal-alignment in the physical, emotional, spiritual and intellectual bodies. We'll unwind the patterns that no longer serve and create new constellations for your highest and best. I'm here to illuminate the healer that already exists within you, support your expansion and witness you living out your soul purpose. I'm Dr. Krystal Lynn Couture, PT, LAc. and with abundant love, gratitude and qi, I honor you. Offerings Testimonials I've had The pleasure of being featured in Grand company — Join Our Email List Grab our journal, The Five Emotions, and gain Chinese Medicine insight for your
